data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3113235,"name":"","username":"Ghozti","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ghozti/{size}/176094_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-23T02:24:08.216Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHello, i recently ran into an odd issue with my team, our rev pneumatics hub just suddenly stopped turning on the compressor. We ran several tests with both devices such as hooking up the compressor with a battery to see it turn on, checked wiring (including CAN) and making sure it was fine, but nothing seemed to work. I also used the “mode” button on the hub to manually turn it on in case it was code but still nothing. The hub activates the solenoids and clearly gets power but it just won’t turn on the compressor.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2022-12-23T02:24:08.216Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":223,"reads":236,"readers_count":235,"score":1162.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":420116,"topic_slug":"rev-pneumatics-hub-not-turning-on-compressor","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":54315,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programmer | Driver"},"post_url":"/t/rev-pneumatics-hub-not-turning-on-compressor/420116/1","custom_user_title":"Programmer | Driver","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3113240,"name":"seg9585","username":"seg9585","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/seg9585/{size}/1974_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-23T02:59:33.479Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHave you used a multimeter to see if there’s any voltage coming out of the compressor power pins on the pneumatics hub?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf not, have you checked to make sure the pressure sensor is shorted (closed) when attempting to run it?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFinally, did you output the Compressor.enabled();
